alert.note: Alert for Eastern Cherry; Western Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 5:34PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Cherry County through 615 PM CDT... At 534 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 18 miles south of Merritt Reservoir, or 24 miles north of Mullen. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Highway 97 crossing the North Loup River, Marsh Flat and Highway 97 crossing Big Creek. This includes Highway 97 between mile markers 81 and 106. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
